data.name: Apple
data.description: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

data.name: Banana
data.description: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit â€“ botanically a berry.

data.name: Cherry
data.description: A cherry is the fruit of many plants of the genus Prunus, and is a fleshy drupe.

data.name: Grape
data.description: A grape is a fruit that grows in clusters of 15 to 300, and can be crimson, black, dark blue, yellow, green, orange, and pink.

data.name: Durian
data.description: The durian is the fruit of several tree species belonging to the genus Durio.

data.name: Kiwi
data.description: Kiwifruit, or Chinese gooseberry is the edible berry of several species of woody vines in the genus Actinidia.

data.name: Lemon
data.description: The lemon is a species of small evergreen tree in the flowering plant family Rutaceae.

data.name: Orange
data.description: The orange is the fruit of various citrus species in the family Rutaceae.

data.name: Pineapple
data.description: The pineapple is a tropical plant with an edible fruit and the most economically significant plant in the family Bromeliaceae.

data.name: Strawberry
data.description: The garden strawberry is a widely grown hybrid species of the genus Fragaria.

data.name: Watermelon
data.description: Watermelon is a flowering plant species of the Cucurbitaceae family.

data.name: Mango
data.description: A mango is a stone fruit produced from numerous species of tropical trees belonging to the flowering plant genus Mangifera.

data.name: Peach
data.description: The peach is a deciduous tree native to the region of Northwest China between the Tarim Basin and the north slopes of the Kunlun Mountains.

data.name: Pear
data.description: The pear is any of several tree and shrub species of genus Pyrus, in the family Rosaceae.

data.name: Plum
data.description: A plum is a fruit of the subgenus Prunus of the genus Prunus.
